message_list.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
I need to change my flight booking, please.
Great, I can help with that. What’s your reservation code (PNR) and last name on the booking?
My reservation code is 25PCZ4, and the last name is Lopez.

Thanks, I’ve pulled up your booking for Lopez under PNR 25PCZ4. Would you like me to search new flights—what new departure date and preferred time of day are you looking for? Morning, afternoon, or evening?
I need to move the first flight to January 13th, preferably morning, and keep the return flight the same.

Got it—January 13 in the morning for the outbound, and keep the return as is. This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I found 3 morning options on Jan 13:
1) 07:10 nonstop, arrives 09:45 — estimated fare difference $42
2) 08:25 nonstop, arrives 11:00 — estimated fare difference $18
3) 10:05 1 stop, arrives 13:40 — no fare difference

Which option would you like to choose?
Perfect, I’ll switch you to the 08:25 nonstop on January 13 and keep your return unchanged. To proceed, could you confirm your email address and phone number so I can update your contact details?
My email is riley.lopez@example.com, and my phone number is +1 6582646270.

Great, thanks Riley. I’ve updated your contact to riley.lopez@example.com and +1 6582646270. Now I’ll finalize the exchange to the Jan 13 08:25 nonstop and keep your return flight the same. There’s an estimated fare difference of $18. Would you like to proceed with the exchange?

All set—your outbound is now January 13 at 08:25 nonstop, arriving 11:00, and your return remains unchanged. The exchange is complete and the $18 balance has been processed. You’ll receive an updated confirmation at riley.lopez@example.com. Anything else I can help with today?
Thanks for choosing Celestar Air—glad I could help. Have a great trip! Goodbye.
